english.segment1: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus. There's just something about that name. Master, Savior, Jesus. Like the fragrance after the rain
english.segment2: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus. There's just something about that name. Master, Savior, Jesus. Like the fragrance after the rain
english.segment3: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus. Let all heaven and earth proclaim
english.segment4: Kings and kingdoms will all pass away. But there's just something about that name
